tests.name: Retrieve single pizza
tests.cmd: retrieveMenu "regina, tomato sauce, ham, mushrooms, cantal, 11€"

tests.name: Retrieve multiple pizzas
tests.cmd: retrieveMenu "formaggio (v), tomato sauce, emmental, 8€, regina, tomato sauce, ham, mushrooms, cantal, 11€"
tests.expected: [ Pizza "formaggio" True ["tomato sauce", "emmental"] 8, Pizza "regina" False ["tomato sauce", "ham", "mushrooms", "cantal"] 11 ]

tests.name: Retrieve large number of pizzas
tests.cmd: retrieveMenu "formaggio (v), tomato sauce, emmental, 8€, tonno, tomato sauce, tuna, 10€, regina, tomato sauce, ham, mushrooms, cantal, 11€, margherita (v), tomato sauce, mozzarella, 7€, caprese (v), tomato sauce, spinach, mozzarella, 8€, hawaii, tomato sauce, pineapple, ham, 9€"
tests.expected: [ Pizza "Pizza "formaggio" True ["tomato sauce", "emmental"] 8, Pizza "tonno" False 10, Pizza "regina" False ["tomato sauce", "ham", "mushrooms", "cantal"] 11, Pizza "margherita" True [ "tomato sauce", "mozzarella" ] 7, Pizza "caprese" True [ "tomato sauce", "spinach", "mozzarella" ] 8, Pizza "hawaii" False [ "tomato sauce", "pineapple", "ham" ] 9 ]
